pkgmetadata.longdescription: # LPIPS-JaxJax port of the original [PyTorch](https://github.com/richzhang/PerceptualSimilarity) implementation of [LPIPS](https://richzhang.github.io/PerceptualSimilarity/). The current version supports pretrained AlexNet and VGG16, and pretrained linear layers.# Installation`pip install lpips_jax`# UsageFor `replicate=False`:```pythonimport lpips_jaximport numpy as npimages_0 = np.random.randn(4, 224, 224, 3)images_1 = np.random.randn(4, 224, 224, 3)lpips = lpips_jax.LPIPSEvaluator(replicate=False, net='alexnet') # ['alexnet', 'vgg16']out = lpips(images_0, images_1)```For `replicate=True````pythonimport lpips_jaximport numpy as npimport jaxn_devices = jax.local_device_count()images_0 = np.random.randn(n_devices, 4, 224, 224, 3)images_1 = np.random.randn(n_devices, 4, 224, 224, 3)# replicate=True is the default settinglpips = lpips_jax.LPIPSEvaluator(net='alexnet') # ['alexnet', 'vgg16]out = lpips(images_0, images_1) # internally calls jax.pmap```
